Associate Software Engineer at SendGrid, Orange Country. CA (Full-time, on-site)

SendGrid invites engineers with unconventional backgrounds for the role of a Software Engineer on their team.

Are you excited about working for a technology company thatâ€™s transforming transactional and marketing emails?

We are looking for a hands-on Associate Software Engineer in Test to help us craft the underlying systems that will allow us to continue to build the business as a leading social education platform.

The major areas of focus for this team include:

  Development of consumer and customer products
  Development of web applications, APIs, services and other technology
  Continuous deployment of quality software
  Security and support of production applications and systems
You will be working with a small team to deliver software in accordance with the timelines with highest possible quality.

We're an agile, fast growing company and this job description isn't meant to be an exhaustive list of your qualifications or all the things you'll do.

Application details: We are committed to having a meritocratic, transparent and bias-free selection process that is inclusive to all applicants.

In order to proceed to the next stage of the interview process, we want to make sure that you are genuinely excited about SendGrid and are able to solve the types of challenges we face.

To apply, take this technical challenge to showcase your capabilities and skills for the role https://www.gapjumpers.me/questions/sendgrid/qs-224/ or email sendgrid@gapjumpers.me
